name: Waterfall
longDesc: A large waterfall plummets from an unseen origin into a fast-moving underground river, and then on further into the distance.
shortDesc: A large waterfall lands here and becomes a swift river.

shelves.name: The View
shelves.desc: You look out and see your helicopter in the distance among the heavily brushed jungle.

shelves.name: Crack in Cavern Wall
shelves.desc: A small, dark crevice that seems to be the perfect place to hide something of value.

doors.name: Slick Stones
doors.desc: A path of water-slicked stones leads off to the west, away from the sound of a waterfall.
